name: senaite.astm
one_line_profile: ASTM instrument communication middleware for SENAITE LIMS
detailed_description: A middleware component for SENAITE LIMS that enables communication with laboratory instruments using the ASTM protocol, facilitating automated data transfer from devices to the information system.

name: senaite.core
one_line_profile: Enterprise Open Source Laboratory Information Management System (LIMS)
detailed_description: The core component of the SENAITE LIMS ecosystem, providing essential laboratory management functionalities including sample tracking, analysis management, and workflow control for scientific laboratories.

name: senaite.health
one_line_profile: Health care laboratory extension for SENAITE LIMS
detailed_description: An extension for SENAITE LIMS specifically designed for health care laboratories, adding clinical logic and workflows for handling medical samples and patient data.

name: senaite.patient
one_line_profile: Patient data management module for SENAITE LIMS
detailed_description: A module for SENAITE LIMS that provides functionality for managing patient information, linking samples to patients, and handling patient-centric laboratory workflows.

name: senaite.storage
one_line_profile: Sample storage management add-on for SENAITE LIMS
detailed_description: An add-on for SENAITE LIMS that manages the physical storage of laboratory samples, including freezer management and storage position tracking.

name: DATAVIEW
one_line_profile: Big data workflow management system for cloud environments
detailed_description: A big data workflow management system designed to execute scientific workflows on cloud infrastructure (Dropbox/EC2), with a focus on security, privacy, and cost optimization.

name: TemplateFlow
one_line_profile: A framework and archive for neuroimaging templates and atlases
detailed_description: TemplateFlow is a DataLad-based archive that provides a standard, programmatic way to access neuroimaging templates and mappings, ensuring reproducibility in spatial normalization workflows.

name: PROV
one_line_profile: Python implementation of the W3C Provenance Data Model (PROV)
detailed_description: A library to create, manipulate, and serialize provenance data according to the W3C PROV standard, essential for tracking data lineage in scientific workflows.

name: galaxy2cwl
one_line_profile: Converter for Galaxy workflows to Common Workflow Language (CWL)
detailed_description: A utility to translate Galaxy workflow descriptions and executions into abstract CWL interfaces, facilitating workflow interoperability and provenance.

name: Coxgraph
one_line_profile: Multi-robot collaborative, globally consistent, online dense reconstruction system
detailed_description: Coxgraph is a system for multi-robot collaborative dense reconstruction. It enables globally consistent online mapping by maintaining a pose graph of sub-maps and optimizing their alignment, suitable for safety, security, and rescue robotics applications.
